sentences.english: The soccer dance had a long history and profound influence.
sentences.chinese: 巫舞歷史悠遠，影響深廣。

sentences.english: This requires limitless range and unfathomable depth of vision.
sentences.chinese: 這要求有無限深廣的視野。

sentences.english: They bathe themselves in the bottomless, shoreless sea of infinite beatitude.
sentences.chinese: 他們在汪洋，深廣無限的福樂大海中沐浴自己。

sentences.english: DHC's brand products in the world the greatest social impact.
sentences.chinese: DHC的品牌產品在全球影響深廣。

sentences.english: But the divide between these private schools and others is widening.
sentences.chinese: 但是，這些私立學校與其它學校的分歧卻愈發深廣。

sentences.english: Opening up deep extension of poem affection space.
sentences.chinese: 詩歌情思空間的拓深廣延。

definition: (of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
abstruse/profound mystery/the mysteries of the universe
in different poses and with different expressions/in thousands of postures (idiom)
to merge together (idiom); to unify disparate elements into one whole
variant of 圖像|图像[tu2 xiang4]
